title: Tools for review freshwater creel data
text: creelreview R package performing rigorous, standardized data quality assurance quality control checks (QAQC) freshwater recreational creel data. used -season monitoring ongoing fisheries critical review complete datasets post-season. work supports CreelEstimates.

title: Tools for review freshwater creel data
text: creelreview can installed GitHub devtools package. GitHub source code repository, requires installation Rtools.

title: Example creel dataset — example_dataset
text: dataset copy "Skagit winter steelhead 2021" fishery. downloaded January 22, 2025 public data repository data.wa.gov. Hosted views WDFW's internal creel database, formatted queries primary data components (e.g., effort, interviews, catch).

title: Generate QAQC report — generate_report
text: function generates HTML QAQC reports specified freshwater creel fisheries saves specified directory. default, reports saved directory called "CreelDataQAQC_reports" current working directory.

title: Generate QAQC report — generate_report
text: fishery_names character vector freshwater creel fishery names. output_dir character string specifying directory save reports.

title: Generate QAQC report — generate_report
text: HTML QAQC report fishery

title: Generate QAQC report — generate_report
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Default usage: saves report to current working directory generate_report(c("Fishery A", "Fishery B"))  # Custom output directory generate_report(c("Fishery A", "Fishery B"), output_dir = "path/to/output") } # }
